channel.title: How To Change 562 login message
channel.description: Im using an atomicscape source and what file do i go in to change name of server login message etc..?

item.title: How To Change 562 login message
item.dc:creator: @ryanyukon199 ryanyukon199
item.description:
@ryanyukon199 wrote:

Hello, I see that this topic has been posted some time ago but,
If you haven’t figured it out yet (WITCH I NOW YOU HAVE)
This is how
Step 1.Open data\scripts…
And in there you will see a file called authentication.PY
Once you opened that as NOTEPAD
And go to the bottom and you will see the welcome message,
Hope you have fun:D
Pce

Read full topic
